transArray.content: The room is not big, but it is relatively clean. The customer service is very good. I will call back every time after my stay! ￼I didn’t bring a charging cable, but the front desk was very nice and lent me one.

Thank you very much for your stay and sharing, and also thank you for your high recognition of Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. The smile on your lips is our greatest appreciation. Since the hotel has been open for a long time, there may be some problems in various aspects. We have gradually updated the facilities in the room for the use of our customers. We also hope that we can do better under your supervision. At the same time, if you have any dissatisfaction during your stay, you can contact the front desk at any time and we will solve it for you in time. I hope you You can see our efforts and progress and look forward to your visit again. Manager: Ji Hongjiao
